title: Zac need some love
body:
{{champion:154}}  

I always think that Zac Q is like a elastic powerful punch but sadly when I see by the first tie it's obly a simple punch, So I suggest this:

Stretching Strike 
Cost 4% of current health
Cooldown 9/8.5/8/7.5/7 seconds
Range 550

Current [Q] Zac lashes out with an elastic punch, dealing 70 / 110 / 150 / 190 / 220 (+50% of ability power) magic damage to all enemies hit and slowing them by 20 / 25 / 30 / 35 / 40% for 2 seconds.

New [Q]

FIRST CAST: Zac begins channeling his elastic punch, gradually increasing the range and damage of Stretching Strike over the next 2 seconds.

Zac can still move while channeling, but can't autoattack or use his other abilities an exception of his W "Unstable Matter", and his movement speed is slowed by 15%. After 4 seconds, Stretching Strike is automatically cancelled, going on full cooldown and refunding half of its health cost.

SECOND CAST: Zac lashes out with an elastic punch, dealing magic damage to all enemies hit and pushing them back slightly, and slowing them for 2 seconds.

RANGE: 375 ~ 825

MINIMUM MAGIC DAMAGE:  50 / 83 / 117 / 150 / 183 (+ 50% AP)
MAXIMUM MAGIC DAMAGE: 90 / 150 / 210 / 270 / 330 (+ 100% AP)

SLOW: 20 / 25 / 30 / 35 / 40%

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

He also need this:

R - Letâ€™s Bounce!	

Passive: Zac gants tenacity bonus

Tenacity: 15 / 25 / 35%

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 
 So with these changes he now feel more elastic and have more cool  plays in his limited repertory.

replies.body:
I commented on a Zac post a long time ago. Just gonna leave the link to my comment.

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/dUEgkz3Y-lets-help-zac?comment=0002

I've said it before I'll say it again: Having your passive actively fling your hp towards your opponent when it was falling randomly before feels like total shit. It's immersion breaking and dumb, and completely screws him out of any ability to lane against ranged or high dps opponents. They need to rework his passive completely or revert and rebalance it so blobs will actually fall randomly again but he's punished more for losing one or rewarded less for picking them up.
